{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Panasonic Viera dedicated Wireless LAN Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://buffalo.jp/products/catalog/network/wli-uv-ag300p/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Buffalo_WLI-UV-AG300P |wikipedia = |brand = Buffalo |model = WLI-UV-AG300 |submodel = P |submodelappend = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = February 6, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Buffalo_WLI-UV-AG300P |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 0411 |device_id = 0197 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = AK8UWABR100 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Atheros;AR7010; |chip2 = Atheros;AR9280; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = Japan only? |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 04/16/2013 |price = |upc = |ean = 4981254660997 |asin = B003LJXYHS |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This dongle would appear to be targeted for used with some ''Panasonic'' VIERA TVs. :It is likely quite similar (if not identical to) the [[Sony UWA-BR100]]. ==Links of Interest== *[http://permalink.gmane.org/gmane.linux.kernel.wireless.general/119270 The USB ID was noted on the ''linux-wireless ml''] ==Notes== ===Additional info=== {{SCollapse|lsusb -v -d 0411:0197 |
